title: Meet the Press Reports: A Party Divided: The GOP & Immigration
description: The crisis at the U.S./Mexico border started long before the Trump Administration’s zero tolerance policy. How a nation founded by immigrants continuously demonizes those who cross our borders, and why the immigration reform impasse in Washington leaves refugees and mixed-status families in fear.
